Isabelle Randeblad

Front End Web Developer

Hi, I’m a General Assembly graduate in Front-End Web Development with a focus on creating clean and user-friendly designs. and am proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, and Git.
I co-developed LanguaMate AI, focusing on the front-end while my partner handled the back-end.
With 8+ years in customer service, I bring a friendly, approachable attitude to my work, always aiming for intuitive, aesthetically pleasing websites.

Melbourne, Australia

Projects

LanguaMate AI

This web app was created as a final project in my course at General Assembly. It is a website aimed at helping language teachers creating word lists with AI generated definitions and example sentences. With fun games and crosswords to make it easy for
the students to practice and learn the new vocabulary.
